Package controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that controls the logic of the main screen of the application.

FUTURE ENHANCEMENT I would like to add two features and one of them is preventing the Part to be delete that has been added to the product. Another interesting addition would be displaying total number of part of each product contain.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Rifatul Karim

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    static class  MainScreenController.ScreenState
    To distinguish the state of the screen to display

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initiated upon calling this controller when starting the program or returning to this screen from other screens. This class requires to initializes the table column for the both tables. Afterwards, it populates the table views with current saved inventory data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • addPart_ClickHandler

      public void addPart_ClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the add Part Screen Displays alert box if it cannot locate PartScreen.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add Part click handler

    • modifyPart_ClickHandler

      public void modifyPart_ClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Loads the selected part data into the modify part screen to edit the data. Displays alert box if it cannot locate PartScreen.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify Part click handler

    • deletePart_clickHandler

      public void deletePart_clickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Delete the selected part data.

      It will print message on the screen if it does not selects data from part table. Also it will show confirmation box before deleting the data.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete Part click handler

    • modifyProduct_clickHandler

      public void modifyProduct_clickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Loads the selected product data into the modify product screen to edit its data. Displays alert box if it cannot locate productscreen.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify Product click handler

    • addProduct_clickHandler

      public void addProduct_clickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the add Product Screen Displays alert box if it cannot locate PartScreen.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add Part click handler

    • deleteProduct_clickHandler

      public void deleteProduct_clickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Delete the selected product data.

      It will show error popup if it does not selects data from product table and also if the selected product has any associate parts.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete Product click handler

    • searchProduct_onKeyPressed_Handler

      public void searchProduct_onKeyPressed_Handler​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Checks if the textfield of the product search is empty then it will refresh the table to the original state.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - search product on key pressed handler

    • searchPart_onKeyPressed_Handler

      public void searchPart_onKeyPressed_Handler​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Checks if the textfield of the part search is empty then it will refresh the table to the original state.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - search part on key pressed handler

    • exitClickHandler

      public void exitClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exits the application
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - exit click handler

    • searchPart_ClickHandler

      public void searchPart_ClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The program looks up for the parts by id or name that partially matches and load them into the table.

      The table will be refreshed to the original state if the textfield is empty.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Part search button action.

    • searchProduct_ClickHandler

      public void searchProduct_ClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The program looks up for the product by id or name that partially matches and load them into the table.

      The table will be refreshed to the original state if the textfield is empty.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Product search button action.
